include(ExternalProject)
ExternalProject_Add(libxaac
  GIT_REPOSITORY    http://github.com/ittiam-systems/libxaac.git
  GIT_TAG           main
  CMAKE_ARGS        -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release
  SOURCE_DIR        "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/externals/libxaac/"
  BINARY_DIR        ""
  INSTALL_COMMAND   ""
  TEST_COMMAND      ""
  PATCH_COMMAND     git apply --reject --whitespace=fix "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/patch/libxaac.patch"
)

ExternalProject_Get_Property(libxaac BINARY_DIR)
set(XAAC_BIN_DIR ${BINARY_DIR})
